channel.title: rabsef-linmyn on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in rabsef-linmyn on Barefoot Rob

item.title: urbit ~rabsef-linmyn
item.description: 14:10 Friday 12 April 2019 JST I got my urbit planet running the other day on my local machine. After some playing around I determined that I should be able to run it on AWS on a t2.micro which fits within their free tier.

item.title: ;join ~dopzod/urbit-help ... but still not connected to talk
item.description: 23:14 Wednesday 10 April 2019 JST I tried ;join /urbit-talk I then followed this tweet ;join ~dopzod/urbit-help But when I type in the talk> field, I do not see my posts anywhere. Later I saw [%dead-request [i=//http/0v14.urbt1/36/1 t=~]] log is below: $ urbit rabsef-linmyn/ ~ urbit 0.7.3 boot: home is /Users/thunderrabbit/urbit/rabsef-linmyn loom: mapped 2048MB boot: protected loom live: loaded: MB/254.885.888 boot: installed 258 jets arvo: time: ~2019.4.10..13.36.55..1b86 rest: checkpoint at event 13.
